channel.title: Spawn Server Req!
channel.description: I am in need of a spawn server source and client. The revision is not the biggest concern. Stability would be nice, good switching/combat, along with either a points system or a token system. I would like some form of economy but I will take what I can get. If anyone knows of the best spawn server available please post the link :D

item.title: Spawn Server Req!
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Just change the rights required for whatever your spawn command is, and you have a spawn server.

Read full topic
